page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: The area which we have been asked to research is full of clubs and associations, of all types e.g. schools, political associations and sports teams. There are brownies, cubs, guides and scouts at both Abington and Linton. Abington & Linton also have football and cricket teams. Hildersham also has a cricket team, but is perhaps too small to have many other clubs. Parent teacher associations exist for Abington Play and Primary Schools, & Linton Village College. Pubs have teams such as darts at the Three Tuns, Abington, and the Pear Tree at Hildersham. An unusual group is the Cambs Salad Producers which helps the production & sale of salads at what used to be the Land Settlement Association. There are Young Farmers Clubs in Abington & Linton.
